name: funsloth
description: Claude Code skills marketplace for fine-tuning language models with Unsloth
author: Chris von Csefalvay <chris@chrisvoncsefalvay.com>

claudePlugin.name: funsloth
claudePlugin.description: Complete workflow for fine-tuning LLMs with Unsloth: dataset validation, notebook generation, training management, and model deployment

skills.name: funsloth-check
skills.description: Validate dataset for fine-tuning: format detection, token analysis, Chinchilla optimality calculation, and optional HF upload. Use before training to ensure data quality.

skills.name: funsloth-train
skills.description: Generate Unsloth training notebooks with sensible defaults, interactive configuration, or ipywidgets for runtime setup. Supports SFT, DPO, GRPO, ORPO, KTO techniques.

skills.name: funsloth-hfjobs
skills.description: Training manager for Hugging Face Jobs. Launches fine-tuning on HF cloud GPUs with optional WandB monitoring. Handles job submission, monitoring, and artifact retrieval.

skills.name: funsloth-runpod
skills.description: Training manager for RunPod GPU instances. Configures pods, launches training, monitors progress, and retrieves checkpoints from network volumes.

skills.name: funsloth-local
skills.description: Training manager for local GPU training. Validates CUDA setup, manages GPU selection, monitors training progress, and handles checkpoint saving.

skills.name: funsloth-upload
skills.description: Generate comprehensive model cards and upload fine-tuned models to Hugging Face Hub. Creates professional documentation with training details, usage examples, and proper metadata.
